For making very beautiful color of gold & of little expense
First take very yellow
orange
peel,
& clean them well of the white that is inside, & pulverize them very well
and
in
a very clean
mortar
. And take as much of
sulfur
, & grind all together, and put everything in a
glass
vial
, & keep them
in the cellar
or
other humid place
for the space of eight or ten
days
. Then when you want to use it, one needs to warm it and use it where you want, & you will see a very beautiful color.
